tier_6_10.name: Sand Worm
tier_6_10.description: A colossal worm that burrows beneath the desert sands, emerging to swallow its prey whole.
tier_6_10.impulse: To devour anything that moves on the surface.
gm_moves: Burst from the sand to swallow a target whole.
Create a sandstorm with its movement.
Tunnel away and emerge in a new location.

tier_6_10.name: Spectre
tier_6_10.description: A powerful, hateful ghost that can possess the living.
tier_6_10.impulse: To drain life and sow hatred.
gm_moves: Attempt to possess a character.
Drain the life force from a target.
Fade into the Ethereal Plane to escape harm.

tier_6_10.name: Troll
tier_6_10.description: A fearsome giant known for its incredible ability to regenerate from wounds.
gm_moves: Attack with rending claws.
Regenerate a grievous wound unless struck by fire or acid.
Throw a large rock.

tier_6_10.name: Wyndian Royal Guard
tier_6_10.description: An elite winged soldier from Wyndia, skilled with both sword and wind magic.
tier_6_10.impulse: To protect Wyndian royalty and interests.
gm_moves: Execute a precise Gale Slash, pushing a target back.
Use their wings to gain a superior position.
Create a defensive gust of wind.

tier_6_10.name: Wyvern
tier_6_10.description: A lesser relative of dragons, with two legs and winged arms. It possesses a venomous stinger on its tail.
gm_moves: Attack with claws and bite.
Strike with a potent poison stinger.
Grab a target and fly into the air.

tier_11_20.name: Cinder-Scale Tyrant
tier_11_20.description: A massive, four-legged drake whose scales are made of cooling magma and obsidian. It guards the inner sanctum of the temple on Mount Dragnor.
tier_11_20.impulse: To guard its lair with overwhelming fire.
gm_moves: Breathe a cone of magma.
Sweep its tail, knocking everyone nearby prone.
Cause a volcanic fissure to erupt on the battlefield.

tier_11_20.name: Elder Treant
tier_11_20.description: An ancient, walking tree of immense size and wisdom, a guardian of the forest.
gm_moves: Deliver a colossal slam with its branches.
Animate nearby trees to fight alongside it.
Entangle foes in living roots.

tier_11_20.name: Hydra
tier_11_20.description: A multi-headed serpent. For each head that is severed, two more may grow in its place.
gm_moves: Attack with multiple heads at once.
Regrow a severed head, unless the wound is cauterized.
Unleash a confusing cacophony of hisses.

tier_11_20.name: Kraken Spawn
tier_11_20.description: A juvenile kraken, though still massive and deadly, with powerful tentacles.
tier_11_20.impulse: To drag ships and sailors to the depths.
gm_moves: Slam the battlefield with multiple tentacles.
Release a cloud of ink to blind and disorient.
Grapple and crush a target.

tier_11_20.name: Lich
tier_11_20.description: A powerful wizard who has achieved a form of immortality through undeath. Commands legions of lesser undead.
tier_11_20.impulse: To accumulate power and knowledge, unhindered by mortality.
gm_moves: Cast a devastating spell like Frost Lance.
Animate the dead to serve as minions.
Paralyze a character with a touch.

tier_21_plus.name: Ancient Gold Dragon
tier_21_plus.description: One of the last of the noble, elder dragons. A being of immense wisdom and power, whose scales shimmer like a thousand sunsets.
tier_21_plus.impulse: To protect the balance of the world.
gm_moves: Unleash a breath of divine fire.
Attack with overwhelming physical might (claws and bite).
Alter the battlefield with ancient magic.

tier_21_plus.name: Archon of Order
tier_21_plus.description: A celestial being of pure law, summoned to enforce Elysia's will. It is a being of living light and unyielding dogma.
tier_21_plus.impulse: To purge all forms of chaos.
gm_moves: Strike with a lance of pure light.
Issue a divine judgment, silencing a character's abilities.
Create an aura of absolute order, hindering chaotic actions.

tier_21_plus.name: Baron
tier_21_plus.description: A high-ranking demon lord, a fiend of immense power and cruelty.
gm_moves: Wield a greatsword of pure hellfire.
Summon lesser demons to its aid.
Create a raging inferno on the battlefield.

tier_21_plus.name: Cathedral Gargoyle
tier_21_plus.description: A massive stone gargoyle animated by holy magic to protect the Elysian Grand Cathedral.
tier_21_plus.impulse: To serve as an eternal guardian.
gm_moves: Attack with claws of sanctified stone.
Turn to stone to become nearly invulnerable.
Heal itself in the presence of bright light.

tier_21_plus.name: Dread Worm
tier_21_plus.description: An even more colossal version of the Sand Worm, ancient and intelligent.
tier_21_plus.impulse: To consume all life in its desert domain.
gm_moves: Swallow a character whole, trapping them in its gullet.
Cause an earthquake by burrowing beneath the party.
Spit corrosive acid.

tier_21_plus.name: Titan
tier_21_plus.description: One of the elder giants, a being of immense size and strength that can shatter mountains.
tier_21_plus.impulse: To slumber, and to crush those who disturb it.
gm_moves: Throw a colossal boulder.
Create an earthquake by stomping its foot.
Deliver a single, earth-shattering blow.

tier_21_plus.name: Void Behemoth
tier_21_plus.description: A creature from the Void, a being of pure chaos and entropy.
gm_moves: Strike with chaotic energy, dealing random elemental damage.
Drain a character's Legacy Points.
Temporarily erase a section of the battlefield.

bosses.name: Blightoad
bosses.description: A horrifically bloated toad-fiend, roughly the size of a small cart. Its slick, warty hide pulses with a sickly green light, and foul-smelling pustules weep a constant, black bile.
gm_moves: Slam its body into a target.
Spit corrosive bile.
Lash out with a barbed tongue, pulling a character closer.
Burst its pustules when struck, damaging nearby attackers.

bosses.name: The Gloomwood Heart
bosses.description: An ancient treant that was once the guardian of the woods, now twisted by a creeping blight. Its wooden body is covered in pulsating fungi and weeping sap, and its movements are unnaturally violent.
gm_moves: Strike with a crushing branch.
Release a cloud of blight spores that damage over time.
Summon corrupted saplings to its aid.

bosses.name: Grand Inquisitor Valerius
bosses.description: A relentless and high-ranking member of the Champions of Order. Clad in blessed silver armor, he views draconic power not as a tool, but as a chaotic sin that must be purged from the world.
bosses.impulse: To capture Rya and impose perfect order.
gm_moves: Attack with a consecrated blade that is anathema to dragons.
Call down Elysian Judgment, silencing a character's power.
Erect a Shield of Order, becoming temporarily immune to chaotic and draconic magic.

bosses.name: Grove Warden
bosses.description: Once a serene, ancient guardian of the wood, this colossal treant has been driven to madness. Its bark is blackened and cracked, weeping a foul, dark sap.
bosses.impulse: To protect its grove through mindless rage.
gm_moves: Deliver a crushing branch attack.
Unleash a sorrowful wail that weakens the party.
Entangle the party in grasping roots.
When bloodied: Enter a Rampaging Fury, increasing its damage and defenses.

bosses.name: Runeforge Guardian
bosses.description: A bipedal construct of obsidian and brass, standing eight feet tall. Glowing runes pulse across its chassis, and its head is a single, unblinking crystalline lens.
gm_moves: Attack with a Siege Fist or an Arcane Bolt.
Trap a character in a cage of solid light.
When bloodied: Go into an Overload Sequence, dealing damage to all nearby creatures each turn.

bosses.name: Elysia, the Silent Goddess
bosses.description: The final antagonist, a being of pure, conceptual energy who seeks to 'correct' the heroes by erasing their free will.
bosses.impulse: To impose perfect, silent, unthinking order.
gm_moves: Issue a Decree of Inertia, halting all movement.
Issue a Decree of Silence, nullifying all magic and abilities.
Issue a Decree of Entropy, attempting to unmake a character from existence.
Warp reality, ignoring the rules of chance and consequence.

bosses.name: The Dragon Lord
bosses.description: The resurrected and empowered spirit of the greatest of the ancient dragon kings.
bosses.impulse: To reclaim his throne and unleash a new age of dragons.
gm_moves: Unleash a breath of overwhelming, primal energy.
Issue a Dragon's Decree, using the most powerful draconic abilities.
Radiate a King's Aura, inspiring all draconic beings and demoralizing others.

bosses.name: The Firstborn of the Void
bosses.description: A colossal entity of mouths, eyes, and tentacles that guards the very heart of the Void Chasm.
bosses.impulse: To consume reality and drive mortals to madness.
gm_moves: Gaze into a character's mind, inflicting permanent madness.
Attack with a swarm of crushing tentacles.
Unravel a piece of the battlefield, turning it into pure void.

bosses.name: The Twin Wardens of the Pinnacle
bosses.description: Two colossal golems guarding Elysia's domain. One absorbs physical, the other magical damage.
bosses.impulse: To act as an impassable, twofold wall.
gm_moves: (Warden of Form) Deliver an annihilating physical blow.
(Warden of Thought) Unleash a devastating psionic blast.
Share damage with its twin if the wrong damage type is used.

bosses.name: The Unfettered, Awakened Zael
bosses.description: Zael, having fully succumbed to the Void and achieved a dark apotheosis.
bosses.impulse: To share the perfect, silent peace of the Void with his friends.
gm_moves: Whisper words of despair, causing the party to lose their resolve.
Gaze into a character's soul, draining their power and vitality.
Summon a lesser horror from the Void to aid him.
